title: Both cameras not working pixel 2 xl
content:
Hi,
Starting cam√©ra app :
App seems tout work ok but black screen (no image) from either front or back cam sensor.
After 3-5 sec. App will close automaticaly.
No error message, nor warning. 
( Same when using other Cam apps. Black screen on both Cam sensors. )

Already cleared cache and app data.
Already validated in safe mode.
Same results.
Any help? 
Thanks!
